#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int a[100005];
int b[100005];
int Merge(int,int,int);
int Mergesort(int low, int high)
{
    int inv_cnt=0;
    if(low<high)
    {
        int mid=(low+high)/2;
        inv_cnt=Mergesort(low,mid);
        inv_cnt+=Mergesort(mid+1,high);
        inv_cnt+=Merge(low,mid,high);
    }
    return inv_cnt;
}
int Merge(int low, int mid, int high)
{
   int h=low,i=low,j=mid+1,k;
   int inv_cnt=0;
   while((h<=mid) && (j<=high))
   {
       if(a[h]<=a[j])
       {
           b[i]=a[h];
           h++;
       }
       else
        {
            b[i]=a[j];
            j++;
            inv_cnt+=(mid-h+1);
        }
        i++;
    }
    if(h>mid)
        for(k=j;k<=high;k++)
        {
            b[i]=a[k];
            i++;
        }
    else
        for(k=h;k<=mid;k++)
        {
            b[i]=a[k];
            i++;
        }
    for(k=low;k<=high;k++)
            a[k]=b[k];

   return inv_cnt;
}
int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    printf("%d\n",Mergesort(0,n-1));
    return 0;
}
